review.comment: We had a very disappointing experience with this company, and will never use again. I was forced to put one star but after the treatment I received would have preferred to put none. We are all so used to excellent customer service these days that it is shocking to deal with a company like The Traditional Shaving Company.  I bought  aftershave cologne online, at a discounted price, as an Xmas present, for my husband in November 2020. He opened the bottle a few  weeks after Christmas, first finishing the one he had. The product from Geo Trumper, ( the same one my father uses) was not right and smelt very bad, like synthetic alcohol and as though it was off. There is no way you could have used it.  Three of us in the family smelt it. The seller said I could send it back for a refund or a different product. He knew the product had been opened as I had told him what the problem was.  He wrote to me a few weeks later and said he could not refund it as ‘it was not in its original packaging’ which he had not mentioned was a stipulation  in his previous emails. He then went on to accuse me of complaining two months after buying it (it was an Xmas present) and also accused us of using it, deciding we did not want it any more and then sending it back. That is simply not true. He has offered to return this product which we clearly don’t want and have no use for. I am now out of pocket by £48 plus postage and feel robbed. PayPal say they cannot help as they do not have a category for this kind of complaint. Have never dealt with a company like this before and hope I never have to again. No doubt the seller will respond to this and accuse me of being a fraudster as he did to someone else who complained. I can’t see a company like this surviving if this is the way they treat HONEST customers.
review.review_reply: This customer purchased some cologne from us (at full price). 3 months later they contacted us to say it was "faulty" because it didn't smell "right". They returned it to us to check but there was nothing wrong with it so we could not refund the product as faulty. They had opened and used the product so we also could not refund it as an unused return. We offered to send them it back free of charge but they declined. Instead they opened a PayPal dispute which they lost because there was no reason for us to refund this customer. Unfortunately there wasn't anything else we could do to help this customer.

review.comment: It looks to have all the things I like but I don't shop online or give my details over the phone
review.review_reply: I don't understand why you have gone to the trouble of reviewing an online shop just to say that you don't use online shops. I wouldn't give a bad review to a pet shop just because I didn't want to buy a pet.

review.comment: Knowledgeable staff and well stocked, great niche shop for gents!

I ordered an Edwin Jagger DE86 Razor from this store, it was delivered very promptly and they added a few carmel/toffee sweets to the postal delivery as a pleasant surprise.

Upon order inspection, my new DE razor had a broken screw-thread, causing the head not to screw in properly. I contacted the Traditional Shaving Company via email, and provided a high-resolution image of the threading issue. Their customer support team promptly responded and noted I could send the item back to them, and they'd inspect it and replace it (as well as pay for the cost of me sending it back).

As I needed a replacement quickly and didn't want the hassle of going to the post office, I ended up buying the same exact item from Fragrance Direct with express next-day delivery. I am a little bit disappointed at Edwin Jagger's quality control in this instance, but I have yet to find a better DE razor at this price range.

I cannot fault the delivery speed, customer support and product prices of the Traditional Shaving Company. I had previously purchased a Merkur Futur Adjustable DE razor from them and I am very happy with that item.

I wholeheartedly recommend the Traditional Shaving Company.
Just a great shop.  Sadly I can't visit more often.
Checked your opening times before setting off. Looks like you decided to close early. Just completed a 112 mile round trip cheers.

Great shop, everyone should use this shop. Helpful professional service with a great knowledge and ability to help and advise. Loyalty card scheme. I will definitely be returning also the saving compared to modern alternatives is shocking. Much less harsh on the skin too. Absolute gem.

Company refusing to give refund and has refused to send product back after it had been returned. If your not sure about a product don't buy from them as they will not refund ... stating that product open and used and unwilling to enter into any reasonable conversation
review.review_reply: This fraudster bought a razor from us, used it for a week and then returned it asking for a refund. They claimed the razor had not been used and they had cleaned the razor on the outside to make it look unused. Our returns inspection found shaving lather residue inside the razor where they didn't clean it well enough. When we pointed this out to the fraudster they threatened to sue us and leave negative feedback online unless we refunded them. The fraudster then raised a dispute with PayPal stating that the product they received was "not as described" despite not being able to provide any details on how the razor was different to how it was advertised. PayPal refunded the fraudster but, fortunately for us, they did this out of their own pocket so we haven't lost any money due to this fraudster. It is interesting to note that the fraudster only returned one item from their order but appealed for a refund of the entire order from PayPal. So they got to keep all the products and got a refund as well! I think that shows the intentions of this person very clearly.

review.comment:
Always helpful. Please help me to get the original tabac hair cream.
I first started using since 1960, this cream was available in Uganda.
The scent is not similar.
Can you help?
Thank you
A massive selection of shave products and excellent service
Always amazing service, costs are very competitive and the free fudge is a nice extra treat.

Great service, very helpful
The don for all your shaving needs
Quick and professional service with items well packaged. Thanks
